verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hima hima leo,
najongea kwako Bwana,
ninakuja kwako
kwa unyenyekevu wangu,
ni - Nakuletea matunda
ya jasho langu,
po - Pokea Baba
nami unipe Baraka. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kwa ukarimu
nimejitolea mimi mwenyewe,
polepole nasonga
mbele nifike kwako,
nikukabidhi nilicho nacho,
hiki kidogo Baba pokea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mapato yangu ni duni sana,
we wanijua,
sina kitu kizuri
cha kukuletea wewe,
nakukabidhi maisha yangu,
uzima wangu Baba pokea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mungu wangu ninakuja
kwako nikushukuru,
umenilinda siku zote asante sana,
mavuno yangu nakupa wewe,
na fedha zangu Baba pokea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Wiki nzima umenijalia uhai bure,
umenikinga na
matatizo unanipenda,
mkate huu nakutolea,
divai hii Baba pokea.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Baraka zako
ninazipokea siku kwa siku
Mungu Baba nionyeshe
mbingu nifanye kazi,
mifugo yangu nakuletea
furaha yangu Baba pokea.
